TheFalcon.name: The Falcon
TheFalcon.description: Let the gale guide thought and thought fall like an arrow.

TheHatchet.name: The Hatchet
TheHatchet.description: Unity of muscle and steel separating life and limb.

TheSerpent.name: The Serpent
TheSerpent.description: Power shaped by subtlety cloaked in cunning.

TheArcanist.name: The Arcanist
TheArcanist.description: Nameless power waits beyond the stars, like a sword anticipating a worthy hand.

TheArcher.name: The Archer
TheArcher.description: The arrowhead entertains only one line of reasoning.

TheManticore.name: The Manticore
TheManticore.description: Because flesh cannot feed famished wrath, cruelty hunts but never eats.

TheScorpion.name: The Scorpion
TheScorpion.description: The hand that assumes the shape of a sword seizes its truth.

TheTiger.name: The Tiger
TheTiger.description: The opened throat does not condemn the hunter, but pours out a river of praise.

TheConqueror.name: The Conqueror
TheConqueror.description: Simple violence does not suffice, only dominion satisfies.

TheKraken.name: The Kraken
TheKraken.description: Where the abyss rises cities fall.

Wrath.name: Wrath
Wrath.description: Let the throne of rancor bathe in blood.

TheCrow.name: The Crow
TheCrow.description: The first to arrive at the universal feast finds every dish full.

TheFly.name: The Fly
TheFly.description: Extinction’s herald reduces all flesh to its most basic function.

TheVulture.name: The Vulture
TheVulture.description: The Baron of Vacuities collects the lost and returns them to his kingdom.

BloodApe.name: Blood Ape
BloodApe.description: At the gate of blood the faithful always find admittance.

Extinction.name: Extinction
Extinction.description: Mere annihilation does not end the contract.

TheHyena.name: The Hyena
TheHyena.description: Extremity of want turns bone to bread and marrow to wine.

TheSupplicant.name: The Supplicant
TheSupplicant.description: Ask of the lesser lest the greater not wish to answer.

Death.name: Death
Death.description: On the final day only one will remain.

Decay.name: Decay
Decay.description: The hand that grinds mountains to motes of dust.

Demilich.name: Demilich
Demilich.description: You should not have come to this place.

TheKey.name: The Key
TheKey.description: Unlock the mind and the flesh transforms.

TheSilkworm.name: The Silkworm
TheSilkworm.description: None harm the one clothed in gold.

TheBasilisk.name: The Basilisk
TheBasilisk.description: Serenity strips the wrathful of their arrogance.

Doppelganger.name: Doppelganger
Doppelganger.description: Illusions vanish, but do not bleed.

TheDragon.name: The Dragon
TheDragon.description: Defiance feeds on dissent like a flame until only blazing rebellion remains.

TheGryphon.name: The Gryphon
TheGryphon.description: The first to ascend builds a stair for those who follow.

Wealth.name: Wealth
Wealth.description: Gold rebukes with a heavy hand.

Cerberus.name: Cerberus
Cerberus.description: Admit the worthy and despoil the weak.

TheArmadillo.name: The Armadillo
TheArmadillo.description: Savage blows batter the living fortress, meaningless as grains of sand scattered over a mountain.

TheAuroch.name: The Auroch
TheAuroch.description: Endure until the plow no longer burdens.

TheCrab.name: The Crab
TheCrab.description: The righteous rebuke conquers where a fool’s wrath cannot.

TheCasque.name: The Casque
TheCasque.description: The steel skull shelters an iron will.

TheHippopotamus.name: The Hippopotamus
TheHippopotamus.description: Blows merely brush the dust from its hide.

TheArena.name: The Arena
TheArena.description: Triumph only favors those who sacrifice everything.

Champion.name: Champion
Champion.description: The torch that blinds the darkness.

Fortress.name: Fortress
Fortress.description: The view from the ramparts reveals a landscape of victory.

TheLizard.name: The Lizard
TheLizard.description: Scars fall away like shed skin.

TheEnchantress.name: The Enchantress
TheEnchantress.description: The gilded cage still imprisons, and the silken cord yet restrains.

TheHuntress.name: The Huntress
TheHuntress.description: The master’s art disdains trophies and leaves no trace.

TheNymph.name: The Nymph
TheNymph.description: Before the tyranny of beauty conquerors yield their crowns.

Pegasus.name: Pegasus
Pegasus.description: Majesty casts away the dross more easily than the wind shrugs off a manacle.

TheStag.name: The Stag
TheStag.description: Compassion humbles arrow, sword, and spear.

TheGoddess.name: The Goddess
TheGoddess.description: Whose radiance ignites stars and incinerates galaxies.

Hope.name: Hope
Hope.description: The beacon burns brightest when shadowed by desperation.

Splendor.name: Splendor
Splendor.description: Her glory engulfs all lesser lights like candles before the sun.
